article_title: Israel stands firm as 'terrifying' Rafah offensive looms.
sentence: It  has  been  a  tense  day  in  Rafah,  following  an  overnight  raid  by  Israeli  forces  to  rescue  two  hostages,  with  nearly  70  Palestinians  killed  in  the  border  city,  according  to  Hamas-run  health  ministry  officials.
